content.heading: C++ Output (Print Text)
paragraphs:
The cout object, together with the << 
operator, is used to output values and print text.
Just remember to surround the text with double quotes (""):
You can add as many cout objects as you want. However, note that it does not insert a new line at the end of the output:
Tip: You will learn how to add new lines in the C++ New Lines chapter.
